definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
Spratly Islands, disputed between China, Malaysia, the Philippines, Taiwan and Vietnam/same as 南沙群島|南沙群岛[Nan1 sha1 Qun2 dao3]
pinyin: Si1 pu3 la1 te4 li4 Qun2 dao3

sentences.english: Terry is so bullheaded; he won't listen to anybody else's opinion.
sentences.chinese: 特利如此頑固，他聽不進別人的意見。

sentences.english: We embark at Montreal for New York.
sentences.chinese: 我們在蒙特利爾上船去紐約。

sentences.english: For shipment destined to Ottawa, On, it should be booked upto Montreal CY.
sentences.chinese: 從蒙特利爾貨場運道渥太華的運輸，應該先預定好。

sentences.english: Chlorofluorocarbons were regulated under the Montreal Protocol starting in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 根據蒙特利爾議定書規定氯氟烴在1987年開始。

sentences.english: This is Peter Paul Biro, who lives in Montréal.
sentences.chinese: 這是彼得保羅比羅，住在蒙特利爾。

sentences.english: The wife of King Gran, and mother of Tristan and Jan.
sentences.chinese: 格蘭王的妻子，特利斯坦和簡的生母。

sentences.english: The Civil War brought a sharp turn to the fortunes of the Bentleys.
sentences.chinese: 內戰給本特利一家的命運帶來截然的轉變。

sentences.english: They say Montreal is the most exciting city in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 他們說蒙特利爾是加拿大最令人興奮的城市。

sentences.english: Montréal is a modern city in every regard.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利爾是一個現代化的城市在各個方面。

sentences.english: Attlee was extremely intelligent and his grasp of the situation was masterly.
sentences.chinese: 阿特利聰明過人，對局勢的把握頗爲高明。

sentences.english: The thin Bartleby was lying on the cold stones.
sentences.chinese: 瘦弱的巴特利拜正躺在冰冷的石頭上。

sentences.english: And Michael Gottlieb recommended doing the animation with a computer.
sentences.chinese: 並且戈特利布建議用一臺電腦來做這個動畫。

sentences.english: "The risks were no greater than what you would expect to see with any surgery, " Wheatley says.
sentences.chinese: “手術預期風險並不比其他任何手術大，”惠特利說。

sentences.english: Obama would be ready to take further gambles on his personal popularity, Sutley said.
sentences.chinese: 薩特利說，奧巴馬將繼續將賭注放在其個人聲望之上。

sentences.english: To Dr. Bethune, Montreal is indeed a special place.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特利爾對白求恩來說是個特別的地方。

sentences.english: God was true to promise made to Jacob at Bethel.
sentences.chinese: 上帝信守在伯特利對雅各的許諾。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Werther, opera by Jules Massenet/Werther, German masculine given name
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
rad (unit of absorbed dose of ionizing radiation) (loanword)
